text: I had purchased a bottle of this Manuka Honey earlier from Amazon and it had done wonders for my dog's intestinal problems.  This is my second bottle but the consistency of the honey is far different from the first one I ordered.  This bottle of honey is thin and runny - much more like a sauce than a real honey consistency, and lighter in color.  I have never seen honey this texture in my life.  A new Whole Foods just opened up nearby and I purchased a bottle of Wedderspoon 16+ there.  When this bottle runs out, I will be very interested to see what texture the one purchased at Whole Foods looks like.
